physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Pen and ink with wash on paperDimensions: 75 x 340 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Watercolour, pen and ink and pencil on paper.The sketch drawn by Lieutenant Michael Houghton shows three sequential topographical views of the coastal region between Raumps [Al Rams, United Arab Emirates] and Ras-al-Khyma [Ra's al-Khaymah, United Arab Emirates].The views were sketched from on board ship and show ‘Ras-al-Khyma’ settlement with latitude reported. Also feature several dhows and an anchored ship.
